channel.title: Being added on msn with help@cia.gov
channel.description:
Quick question,
Ive been added by an email, 'help@cia.gov' which I have denied in my msn. Ive searched google to see how to make this kind of email address but I assumed someone would already have made the "help" name before...
Ive found 3 references searching google, 1. Involves trying to make names like @cia.gov/com 2. a 15 year old being added on msn with *something*@cia.gov and asking about it. The posts after that were asking the guy to take screen shots to prove it. 3. This post on moparisthebest.com forums
Title: Re: New Mopar instant messaging list-UPDATED EVERY DAY Post by: dudeofthed on May 26, 2007, 03:16:57 am Add me: dudeofthed@cia.gov (http://mailto:dudeofthed@cia.gov)
I would fit in the: Scar Helping Just Chat Server Help ------- end of copy paste
I am not too concerned as my brother in laws hotmail accounts were hijacked a couple weeks back then on the same night 5 mins apart this help@cia.gov tries to add my msn, and another in my family.
Anyone have any beneficial info/thoughts on this?

item.title: Being added on msn with help@cia.gov
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“bowserjr2, post:5, topic:285477”][quote author=sanga282 link=topic=377263.msg2841417#msg2841417 date=1245998131]
there was a thread here about how to do it
[/quote]
This you mean: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,46809.0.html[/quote]
fucked if i know

Read full topic

item.description:
@alanh wrote:

Quick question,

Ive been added by an email, ‘help@cia.gov’ which I have denied in my msn. Ive searched google to see how to make this kind of email address but I assumed someone would already have made the “help” name before…

Ive found 3 references searching google,

  1. Involves trying to make names like @cia.gov/com
  2. a 15 year old being added on msn with something@cia.gov and asking about it. The posts after that were asking the guy to take screen shots to prove it.
  3. This post on moparisthebest.com forums

Title: Re: New Mopar instant messaging list-UPDATED EVERY DAY
Post by: dudeofthed on May 26, 2007, 03:16:57 am

dudeofthed@cia.gov (http://mailto:dudeofthed@cia.gov)

Just Chat
Server Help

end of copy paste

I am not too concerned as my brother in laws hotmail accounts were hijacked a couple weeks back then on the same night 5 mins apart this help@cia.gov tries to add my msn, and another in my family.

Anyone have any beneficial info/thoughts on this?
